overview: Despite being only 20 years old, Slim has lots of experience with tourists and is our guide for our discovery of his country's hidden treasures.  In discreet places his friends and cousins - some really well-hung guys - fuck the curious.  A reality reportage about the art and erotic practices of the south. Live the 11 new actors' clandestine adventures and submit to the thrills of the desert.
title: Nomades 6: Trésors secrets
